attributes.background: There is a Covid19 vaccine in the works, with talks of it being made mandatory. If you want to live normally ie. Holidays, employment meals out etc you'll have to show proof of vaccination. We won't be injected with God knows what. Our human rights are being stripped. We the people, refuse.

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

You might like to sign this related petition:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
